trans-unit.source: The hub control uses a hierarchical navigation pattern to support apps with a relational information architecture.
trans-unit.target: The hub control uses a hierarchical navigation pattern to support apps with a relational information architecture.

trans-unit.source: Hub controls
trans-unit.target: Hub controls

trans-unit.source: Hub control/pattern
trans-unit.target: Hub control/pattern

trans-unit.source: A hub control lets you organize app content into distinct, yet related, sections or categories.
trans-unit.target: A hub control lets you organize app content into distinct, yet related, sections or categories.

trans-unit.source: Sections in a hub are meant to be traversed in a preferred order, and can serve as the starting point for more detailed experiences.
trans-unit.target: Sections in a hub are meant to be traversed in a preferred order, and can serve as the starting point for more detailed experiences.

trans-unit.source: Example of a hub
trans-unit.target: Example of a hub

trans-unit.source: Content in a hub can be displayed in a robust panning view that allows users to get a glimpse of what's new, what's available, and what's relevant.
trans-unit.target: Content in a hub can be displayed in a robust panning view that allows users to get a glimpse of what's new, what's available, and what's relevant.

trans-unit.source: Hubs typically have a page header, while multiple content sections each get a section header.
trans-unit.target: Hubs typically have a page header, while multiple content sections each get a section header.

trans-unit.source: The hub control has several features that make it work well for building a content navigation pattern.
trans-unit.target: The hub control has several features that make it work well for building a content navigation pattern.

trans-unit.source: Visual navigation
trans-unit.target: Visual navigation

trans-unit.source: A hub allows content to be displayed in a diverse, brief, easy-to-scan array.
trans-unit.target: A hub allows content to be displayed in a diverse, brief, easy-to-scan array.

trans-unit.source: Categorization
trans-unit.target: Categorization

trans-unit.source: Each hub section allows for its content to be arranged in a logical order.
trans-unit.target: Each hub section allows for its content to be arranged in a logical order.

trans-unit.source: Mixed content types
trans-unit.target: Mixed content types

trans-unit.source: With mixed content types, variable asset sizes and ratios are common.
trans-unit.target: With mixed content types, variable asset sizes and ratios are common.

trans-unit.source: A hub allows each content type to be uniquely and neatly laid out in each hub section.
trans-unit.target: A hub allows each content type to be uniquely and neatly laid out in each hub section.

trans-unit.source: Variable page and content widths
trans-unit.target: Variable page and content widths

trans-unit.source: Being a panoramic model, the hub allows for variability in its section widths.
trans-unit.target: Being a panoramic model, the hub allows for variability in its section widths.

trans-unit.source: This is great for content of different depths, and allows a small-to-high number of items to format equally well.
trans-unit.target: This is great for content of different depths, and allows a small-to-high number of items to format equally well.

trans-unit.source: Flexible architecture
trans-unit.target: Flexible architecture

trans-unit.source: If you'd prefer to keep your app architecture shallow, you can fit all channel content into a hub section summary.
trans-unit.target: If you'd prefer to keep your app architecture shallow, you can fit all channel content into a hub section summary.

trans-unit.source: Important APIs
trans-unit.target: Important APIs

trans-unit.source: Hub class (XAML)
trans-unit.target: Hub class (XAML)

trans-unit.source: HubSection class (XAML)
trans-unit.target: HubSection class (XAML)

trans-unit.source: Hub object (HTML)
trans-unit.target: Hub object (HTML)

trans-unit.source: Is this the right control?
trans-unit.target: Is this the right control?

trans-unit.source: The hub control works well for displaying large amounts of content that is arranged in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: The hub control works well for displaying large amounts of content that is arranged in a hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: Hubs prioritize the browsing and discovery of new content, making them useful for displaying items in a store or a media collection.
trans-unit.target: Hubs prioritize the browsing and discovery of new content, making them useful for displaying items in a store or a media collection.

trans-unit.source: A hub is just one of several navigation elements you can use; to learn more about navigation patterns and the other navigation elements, see the [Navigation design basics for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn958438).
trans-unit.target: A hub is just one of several navigation elements you can use; to learn more about navigation patterns and the other navigation elements, see the [Navigation design basics for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn958438).

trans-unit.source: Hub architecture
trans-unit.target: Hub architecture

trans-unit.source: The hub control has a hierarchical navigation pattern that support apps with a relational information architecture.
trans-unit.target: The hub control has a hierarchical navigation pattern that support apps with a relational information architecture.

trans-unit.source: A hub consists of different categories of content, each of which maps to the app's section pages.
trans-unit.target: A hub consists of different categories of content, each of which maps to the app's section pages.

trans-unit.source: Section pages can be displayed in any form that best represents the scenario and content that the section contains.
trans-unit.target: Section pages can be displayed in any form that best represents the scenario and content that the section contains.

trans-unit.source: wireframe of a hierarchical Food with Friends app
trans-unit.target: wireframe of a hierarchical Food with Friends app

trans-unit.source: Layouts and panning/scrolling
trans-unit.target: Layouts and panning/scrolling

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to lay out and navigate content in a hub; just be sure that content lists in a hub always pan in a direction perpendicular to the direction in which the hub scrolls.
trans-unit.target: There are a number of ways to lay out and navigate content in a hub; just be sure that content lists in a hub always pan in a direction perpendicular to the direction in which the hub scrolls.

trans-unit.source: Horizontal panning
trans-unit.target: Horizontal panning

trans-unit.source: Example of a horizontally panning hub](images/controls_hub_horizontal_pan.png) **Vertical panning**
trans-unit.target: Example of a horizontally panning hub](images/controls_hub_horizontal_pan.png) **Vertical panning**

trans-unit.source: Example of a vertically panning hub](images/controls_hub_vertical_pan.png) **Horizontal panning with vertically scrolling list/grid**
trans-unit.target: Example of a vertically panning hub](images/controls_hub_vertical_pan.png) **Horizontal panning with vertically scrolling list/grid**

trans-unit.source: Example of a horizontally panning hub with a vertically scrolling list](images/controls_hub_horizontal_vertical_scroll.png) **Vertical panning with horizontally scrolling list/grid**
trans-unit.target: Example of a horizontally panning hub with a vertically scrolling list](images/controls_hub_horizontal_vertical_scroll.png) **Vertical panning with horizontally scrolling list/grid**

trans-unit.source: Example of a horizontally panning hub
trans-unit.target: Example of a horizontally panning hub

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Examples

trans-unit.source: The hub provides a great deal of design flexibility.
trans-unit.target: The hub provides a great deal of design flexibility.

trans-unit.source: This lets you design apps that have a wide variety of compelling and visually rich experiences.
trans-unit.target: This lets you design apps that have a wide variety of compelling and visually rich experiences.

trans-unit.source: You can use a hero image or content section for the first group; a large image for the hero can be cropped both vertically and horizontally without losing the center of interest.
trans-unit.target: You can use a hero image or content section for the first group; a large image for the hero can be cropped both vertically and horizontally without losing the center of interest.

trans-unit.source: Here is an example of a single hero image and how that image may be cropped for landscape, portrait, and narrow width.
trans-unit.target: Here is an example of a single hero image and how that image may be cropped for landscape, portrait, and narrow width.

trans-unit.source: hero image cropped for different window sizes
trans-unit.target: hero image cropped for different window sizes

trans-unit.source: On mobile devices, one hub section is visible at a time.
trans-unit.target: On mobile devices, one hub section is visible at a time.

trans-unit.source: Example of a hub pattern on a small screen
trans-unit.target: Example of a hub pattern on a small screen

trans-unit.source: Recommendations
trans-unit.target: Recommendations

trans-unit.source: To let users know that there's more content in a hub section, we recommend clipping the content so that a certain amount of it peeks.
trans-unit.target: To let users know that there's more content in a hub section, we recommend clipping the content so that a certain amount of it peeks.

trans-unit.source: Based on the needs of your app, you can add several hub sections to the hub control, with each one offering its own functional purpose.
trans-unit.target: Based on the needs of your app, you can add several hub sections to the hub control, with each one offering its own functional purpose.

trans-unit.source: For example, one section could contain a series of links and controls, while another could be a repository for thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: For example, one section could contain a series of links and controls, while another could be a repository for thumbnails.

trans-unit.source: A user can pan between these sections using the gesture support built into the hub control.
trans-unit.target: A user can pan between these sections using the gesture support built into the hub control.

trans-unit.source: Having content dynamically reflow is the best way to accommodate different window sizes.
trans-unit.target: Having content dynamically reflow is the best way to accommodate different window sizes.

trans-unit.source: If you have many hub sections, consider adding semantic zoom.
trans-unit.target: If you have many hub sections, consider adding semantic zoom.

trans-unit.source: This also makes it easier to find sections when the app is resized to a narrow width.
trans-unit.target: This also makes it easier to find sections when the app is resized to a narrow width.

trans-unit.source: We recommend not having an item in a hub section lead to another hub; instead, you can use interactive headers to navigate to another hub section or page.
trans-unit.target: We recommend not having an item in a hub section lead to another hub; instead, you can use interactive headers to navigate to another hub section or page.

trans-unit.source: The hub is a starting point and is meant to be customized to fit the needs of your app.
trans-unit.target: The hub is a starting point and is meant to be customized to fit the needs of your app.

trans-unit.source: You can change the following aspects of a hub:
trans-unit.target: You can change the following aspects of a hub:

trans-unit.source: Number of sections
trans-unit.target: Number of sections

trans-unit.source: Type of content in each section
trans-unit.target: Type of content in each section

trans-unit.source: Placement and order of sections
trans-unit.target: Placement and order of sections

trans-unit.source: Size of sections
trans-unit.target: Size of sections

trans-unit.source: Spacing between sections
trans-unit.target: Spacing between sections

trans-unit.source: Spacing between a section and the top or bottom of the hub
trans-unit.target: Spacing between a section and the top or bottom of the hub

trans-unit.source: Text style and size in headers and content
trans-unit.target: Text style and size in headers and content

trans-unit.source: Color of the background, sections, section headers, and section content
trans-unit.target: Color of the background, sections, section headers, and section content
